const audioRefs=useRef([]);const[playingSounds,setPlayingSounds]=useState(new Set());const toggleSound=useCallback((soundFile,index,volume)=>{const audio=audioRefs.current[index];if(!audio)return;setPlayingSounds(prevPlayingSounds=>{const newPlayingSounds=new Set(prevPlayingSounds);if(newPlayingSounds.has(soundFile)){audio.pause();newPlayingSounds.delete(soundFile);}else{audio.volume=volume;audio.play();newPlayingSounds.add(soundFile);}return newPlayingSounds;});},[]);// Efeito para iniciar os sons quando a investigaÃ§Ã£o comeÃ§a
